## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter">OptimizationRemarkEmitter</a> legacy analysis pass.

Note that this pass shouldn&#39;t generally be marked as preserved by other passes. It&#39;s holding onto BFI, so if the pass does not preserve BFI, BFI could be freed.

Definition at line 145 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/optimizationremarkemitter-h">OptimizationRemarkEmitter.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getAnalysisUsage() {#a44f11b80f077d6ebcac565cdef537011}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void OptimizationRemarkEmitterWrapperPass::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp;) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - This function should be overriden by passes that need analysis information to do their job.

If a pass specifies that it uses a particular analysis result to this function, it can then use the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;AnalysisType&gt;()</a> function, below.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/optimizationremarkemitter-h/#l00153">153</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/optimizationremarkemitter-h">OptimizationRemarkEmitter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/optimizationremarkemitter-cpp/#l00119">119</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/optimizationremarkemitter-cpp">OptimizationRemarkEmitter.cpp</a>.
